content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I don't have a lot of money. I was thinking about 400 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 400 Euro per month is much lower than what I'm expecting for this apartment. It's in the city center, with all amenities nearby. I would say a more fair price would be around 800 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a lot of money for me. I am a dependable and responsible student, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. So, I am not asking for a lower price just because. I am genuinely in need of a lower price because I am a student and I have to save money. How about 500 Euro per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 Euro per month is still much lower than what I'm looking for. I understand that you're a student and might have financial constraints, but this is a very reasonable price for the location and the amenities provided. Would you be able to negotiate a bit higher? Perhaps 650 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am also smart and I don't get easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. How about 550 Euro per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 Euro per month is getting closer to what I'm expecting, but it's still a bit lower. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement. Let's meet in the middle. How about 600 Euro per month? This is a very fair price for both of us. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 600 Euro per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement. Welcome to your new home! Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I appreciate it. Do we have a contract that I can sign? I will be a smart, dependable and responsible tenant. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I don't want to cause any problems for you. I just need a place to live where I can focus on my studies. I hope this apartment will be a good fit for me.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, I will provide you with a contract that outlines all the terms and conditions of the lease. You will find me a fair and reasonable landlord, but I must remind you that I do expect my tenants to maintain high standards of conduct and to take good care of the property. I'm sure you will be a wonderful tenant, and I look forward to a long and productive relationship. Is there anything else you need before we finalize the paperwork?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your kind words. I am a student and I don't have a lot of money, but I am willing to pay the deposit and the first month's rent. However, I need a little more time to gather the necessary funds. Would it be possible for me to pay you next week? I promise I will not cause any problems for you. I just need a little more time to gather the necessary funds.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm willing to give you some time to gather the necessary funds, but I must insist on a firm commitment from you. Can you provide me with a specific date by which you will be able to pay the deposit and the first month's rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I promise I will pay you by the end of next week. I will be a responsible tenant. I will pay you the deposit and the first month's rent by the end of next week. I will not cause any problems for you. I just need a little more time to gather the necessary funds.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Alright, I'll trust your word. Please make sure to have the deposit and the first month's rent paid by the end of next week. Once we have the contract signed and the funds received, we can proceed with the lease. Is there anything else you need assistance with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I appreciate it. I don't want to cause any problems for you. I just need a place to live where I can focus on my studies. I hope this apartment will be a good fit for me. I don't have any other questions at the moment. I will pay you by the end of next week.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful. I'm glad to hear that you're looking forward to focusing on your studies in a good environment. If you have any further questions or need any assistance with the contract or the move-in process, please let me know. I'm here to help. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your help. I appreciate it. I will pay you by the end of next week. I will be a responsible tenant. I will not cause any problems for you. I just need a place to live where I can focus on my studies. I hope this apartment will be a good fit for me. I don't have any other questions at the moment. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
